about: Highly motivated seasoned and proactive software engineer with {{years_count:2006}} of rich experience in web software development in successful tech companies.
requirements: I require a sponsorship for a new role in the UK (Tier 2 General Visa)

experiences.title: Senior Frontend Developer
duties: Developed new web projects of the company and optimised performance for existed projects.
Developed solution able to aggregate and visualize data.
Built and maintained various tools that facilitate and support the business.
Developed new React components, React hooks and AngularJS directive.
Optimised applications' performance and responsiveness for browsers and mobile devices.
Refactored legacy code of existed projects
Reviewed code, interviewed new candidates.
Coached less experienced staff members.

experiences.title: Senior PHP Developer
experiences.description: Badoo is the largest dating network in the world. With 370 million users across 190 countries and 450 employees worldwide, it provides the best technology for people to meet, because happiness is better shared. Each day more than 400,000 people sign up for a Badoo experience; users send over 350 million messages and 10 million photos are added to the Badoo platform. Users spend an average of 1.8 hours daily on the Badoo experience, for a total of over 12 billion swipes per day.
duties: Developed new features and maintained exists functionality for users' profiles, photos, verification service, external and internal projects of the company.
Designed DB & workflow architecture for new features.
Developed of proxy service for avoiding connections blocks.
Participated in the creation of a new service for searching for lookalikes by an uploaded photo.
Implemented A/B tests, GDPR, and so on.
Worked on optimisation project for highload.
Wrote tests, reviewed code & PR.

experiences.title: Senior PHP / JavaScript Developer
experiences.description: Currency Solutions is a rather large Foreign Exchange firm, that unlike other companies, that usually handle both smaller and larger payments, focuses only on large transfers.
duties: Developed web service (JavaScript + React) for global money transfer.
Developed backend for the transfer service, REST API.
Designed DB architecture and optimised highload performance.
Wrote tests, reviewed code.
Supported CRM system of the company and created new features for it.

experiences.title: Senior PHP Developer
experiences.description: Topface is world famous social network for datings with more than 90 million users. Development for highload: ~90rps, ~1.5 mln users daily.
duties: Developed users' activity system and DB architecture (such as messages, sympathies, gifts and so on) for increasing stability, safety, performance, failover and highload.
Developed of the intellectual system for counting of users' activity, with automatic recalculation in case of failures.
Implemented A/B tests and monetization experiments.
Developed backend for highload.
Wrote tests, reviewed code.

experiences.title: Senior PHP / JavaScript Developer
experiences.description: StarLine is a service for transport monitoring and remote alarms, and sensors control.
duties: Developed back-end and front-end of service for monitoring cars by GPS data.
Developed new algorithms for analysis cars' tracks and removing noise GPS-data.
Coached less experienced staff members, reviewed code.
Interviewed new candidates for vacancies of the company.

experiences.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experiences.description: M2C ltd is the largest provider of Internet, digital television and telephony in Murmansk.
duties: Developed and maintained of internal & external services of the company.
Integrated company's billing with external payment systems.
Developed web-service for managing digital television provided for clients.
Developed advertising management and SMS notification systems.
Designed database architecture.
Developed flash applications.
Worked on tech development for a new TV channel of the company.
Created a lot web-sites for the company needs.

projects.title: Game "Mazay Mahjong and bunnies"
description: Personal project I made in free time.

I designed a game concept, elements and levels of the game, and I selected the music. I was in collaboration with the artist about ideas and concepts, analyzed logic and users' behaviour. I edited the received images and the design of the game, I designed the system architecture for highload, and wrote front-end and back-end code.

awards.title: I have got 2 years in row License Certificate from JetBrains for the contribution and development to open source PHP projects
description: In 2018 and 2019 JetBrains Company provided me License Certificate for JetBrains All Products Pack for the contribution and development to open source PHP projects.

awards.description: This award has confirmed the participation and victory in the regional project. The best information site. It was my own personal project. I was as a designer and a programmer. http://4erdak.ru/news/4791/
